description:
Velouté, Chup, and company encounter an accountant. However, this is no ho-hum bookkeeper: Mr. Wolfmann is a werewolf in sheepish clothing. Chup and the gang pin their hopes on Mr. Wolfmann and his potential to vanquish VamPIEr. But if Mr. Wolfmann messes up, then Chup’s quest might be ruined.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Who Wants the Last Slice of Pie?
月夜のオッサンラプソディ
